sub_title: Executive, former Managing Director L'Oréal Netherlands & L'Oréal Belgilux
summary:
35 years in the consumer goods industry, 18 years Country managing director at L’Oreal, 8 last years in the Benelux, before in Poland, Czech Republic and Slovakia.

Based in Amsterdam, working currently on a personal project in the Netherlands and Germany.

Open to cooperation with companies, consultants, investors who look for FMCG expertise, particularly related to portfolio analysis, go to market review, E-commerce acceleration, organisational transformation.

I value curiosity, humility, fairness.
